name: eric
text: Hiram is the quintessential example of a poorly coded boyfriend.

name: arcibi
text: The Will and Grace fanfiction makes it for me

name: spinynorman
text: They figured out how to code an emotion by making it the "paella you spent all damn day making." Oregan Trail has broken the mould.

name: laserblade
text: I'm pretty sure those are just headers.

name: slab64
text:
It's not entirely Hiram's fault - how would YOU adjust to living in the future with your gay boyfriend?

I just want to know what kind of car he crashed. Was it a Nissan?

name: untilyouaresonude
text: It was a silver Rav 4 with a sunroof.

name: featurelessvoid
text: Yes, it was a Nissan. Probably a sensible sedan .

name: professorhazard
text: I figured it was a Neon.

name: tragicone
text: i think it is a Neon. Older models are straight up homosexual.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: A comment left by fuckyoufriday was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Marcus_Brody, Afkpuz, Slab64, dj)

name: dougthehead
text: Turns out that when gay computer programmers are unhappy with their relationship, they write autobiographical modules of Oregon Trail.  This is a great example of Onstad's gift for characterization.

name: aaron_haynes
text: Hahahahaha, I was thinking the exact same thing.

name: gormster
text: As a genuine gay computer programmer, I can tell you that this is exactly the case .

name: badganjil
text:
Chubby him. ^

CHUBBY HIM.

name: semiquaver
text: I have a chubby FOR...no, I can't do it.  Fuck.

name: charchar
text: You tried and that's what matters. A chubby for your troubles, sir.

name: semiquaver
text: Oops.  I meant I couldn't make the joke, not....  Did everyone else out there just misinterpret that the same way?  God damn it all to hell. ;-;

name: charchar
text: No, the effort was for trying to make the joke.  I once tried making a joke about a crocodile attack ("a reptile dysfunction") but i sissed out.

name: mattylite
text: I thank you for that punchline (the joke is the easy part), but all my friends will hate you for providing it by the fifth time I tell them the joke.

name: charchar
text: This is why I'm here.

name: boredom_man
text: It's cool, Semiquaver. Best get that embarrassing first out of the way at 17, when you can still wiggle your ears out of it.

name: semiquaver
text: Stop misinterpreting me, or I'll pour bloody hot fat on the mayor.

name: boredom_man
text: Gavin Newsom? He's got problems enough, man. Wait until you turn 18, at least.

name: semiquaver
text: You live in San Fran?

name: boredom_man
text: Well, no, but my mayor's big controversies involve downtown gentrification and a tax for emergency flood relief. If you can make a hot bloody fat joke about that, you are a better man than I.

name: semiquaver
text: I can't help but giggle at the phrase "emergency flood relief."

name: boredom_man
text: Conceded and v-chubbed.

name: snowman
text: Chubbles.

name: tragicone
text: is your boyfriend achewood literate?

name: gormster
text:
My last boyfriend certainly wasn't.

We broke up.

name: tragicone
text: I am sorry to hear that. If I were gay I would attempt to assist but alas, I am not.

name: nigelchaos
text: Wow. Your short yet concise description there speaks volumes.

name: semiquaver
text: We're two years apart...eshm...you wanna go out?  *slumps*  It's so hard finding Achewood-loving boyfriends ;-;

name: gormster
text: Eshm is some profound onomatopoeia. Do you live in Sydney? That's kind of the crux of the whole thing.

name: drskradley
text: Blatant flirting and pseudo-hooking-up on Assetbar strikes again !

name: semiquaver
text: I wouldn't call it flirting.  I'd call it desperation.  So many boys, so few with a decent sense of humor.

name: wittyname
text: Maybe someday you'll find that special man to move into the future with.

name: semiquaver
text: Mom? Dad? I want you to meet the young Truman Capote.

name: wittyname
text: Okay, I know who Truman Capote is, but I have no idea what you're getting at here. Mind breaking down the sentence there for the mentally inept?

name: deusoma
text: The idea is that Capote moved to the future with him after they hooked up.

name: semiquaver
text: I live in the perpetually rainy northwest corner of the United States.  So, no.  *sighs*

name: semiquaver
text: I live in the perpetually rainy northwest corner of the United States.  So, no.  *sighs*

name: semiquaver
text: Holy shit, how did that doublepost?  It's like Stephen Colbert just vomited all over the page.  It's thoroughly unpleasant.  I should just go hang out with my neighbor MR. COLIN MELOY OF THE DECEMBERISTS.

name: semiquaver
text: Dammit.  He moved.  At least I'm still pretty. ;-;

name: jollysaintpete
text: stop with the semicolons immediately

name: semiquaver
text: you will not banish my weeping emoticon

name: tragicone
text: Whoa, wait. Semiquaver is pretty? Well when did this happen?

name: aelindil
text:
If you mean the general Seattle-Tacoma metropolitan area, then I certainly share your sighs and similar emotions.

Maybe ju an' me are AMIGOS!

name: semiquaver
text: Sorry.  Portland.

name: aelindil
text:
Oh right, the slightly warmer and hipster-ful version of Seattle. Also I assume less drug/gang warring.

Yay Tacoma.

name: shutup_shutup
text: The funny thing here is that you seem to be saying that Seattle is not hipster-ful.  I mean, I know hipsters love Portland and all, but they also love living up here and bitching about not living in Seattle Junior.

name: aelindil
text:
As far as I can tell, Seattle is currently morphing into some entirely different sort of animal where the hipsters are actually semi-cool 30-somethings working in some technological field. Seriously, if you walk around downtown (not counting Capitol Hill, that place is littered with teh hipstaz), you're 10 times more likely to see young professionals with tattoos wearing suits and chatting about Shiny Gadget du jour than actual hipsters.

Also there is a startling lack of the faux-lumberjacks that populated the area way back in the day. I miss those particularly.

name: shutup_shutup
text: I suggest Ballard for faux-lumberjacks - a word which I totally just wrote as lumberjokes.  True fact.

name: aelindil
text:
That there is a term that needs to be coined, pronto .

"Oh my gawd Susie, did you see that guy over there with the beard? What a lumberjoke!"

name: shutup_shutup
text: I support this initiative lots.

name: tragicone
text: who wait. Semiquaver is gay? well when did this happen?

name: aelindil
text: I don't know, but it broke my poor little heart.

name: fineoakstructure
text: he has known since he was twel...you know what? fuck it.

name: semiquaver
text:
exactly correct.

you know what looking back on all this i'm stunned at how few lames were incurred. some people must not have been paying attention.

name: boredom_man
text: are you the gay computer programmer who wore the big golden cock in the yes men movie because um he was a gay computer programmer and that would be hugely rad

name: professorhazard
text: I always assumed _THE_BANDIT_ was one of the Achewood characters - most likely Lie Bot.

name: xiaomimi
text:
#Hiram_robs_you_and_somehow_gets_you_arrested_for_buggery

#Hirams_foreign_ties_get_you_in_trouble_with_the_British_government

name: fermatprime
text: Mega-chubbs for the Turing reference.

name: belgand
text: Are we absolutely certain that the programmer is a man? Are we certain that Hiram is gay and not just bi? These questions were not answered yet.

name: nurdbot

text:
but if molly plays this, then hiram is not gay.

though he is still the lady of the relationship.

name: overmedicated
text: A comment left by overmedicated was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by bug, NigelChaos, durrr)

name: tropicana
text:
Well, we don't play computer games.

Or read webcomics about anthropomorphic cats.

Of course not.

name: bixschmix
text: No, never! Girls only like dresses and makeup and shopping and manicures!

name: nigelchaos
text: Win.

name: charchar
text: Don't forget cookie dough and feelings!

name: autrepoupee
text: and comparing breasts and pillow fights and cake batter

name: bixschmix
text: I like to tell boys that when we girls get together alone we always have pillow fights in our lingerie. It's good fun.

name: charchar
text: Wait, are we not supposed to for real? so that's why no-one plays with me anymore...

name: semiquaver
text: Comparing breasts and pillow fights and cake batter?  Why would you compare pillow fights?

name: autrepoupee
text: For critiquing purposes, of course.  At the annual "No Boyz Allowed!" convention we go over the tapes, to better ourselves, and our soft, downy fights.

name: bixschmix
text: Sometimes we practice kissing, too. And, of course, we have to raise money with a bikini-clad car wash. I mean, we have to buy the cookie dough somehow ...

name: tropicana
text: STOP GIVING AWAY THE SECRETS! WITHOUT THEM, WE WILL HAVE NO POWER!

name: bixschmix
text: ...Says the ejaculating penis.

name: tropicana
text: You... you leave that out of this.

text: hiram is expensive

text: A comment left by songbirdspectre was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by waldo913, fuckyoufriday, Boredom_Man)

text: Soundbase sounds like some sort of digital codpiece to me.

name: cousinted
text: Jesus Christ, that's like the third time I've misspelled something today, what is wrong with me?

name: professorhazard
text: Diabetes.

text: #Hiram_is_smothering_the_bandit

name: the_stoned_one
text:
is smothering the bandit a sexual position?
i think ive tried that one
its hard on the shins though

name: c_dizzle
text: I'm giving this a 5 - shamelessly - because of mentioning corgis.

name: i_love_kate
text: Psst... c_dizzle is the Queen of England.

name: aelindil
text: She's actually got a dorgi now... it is a cross between a dachshund and a corgi.  Pretty cute, fairly elongated.

name: fuckalgebra
text:
This arc was how I introduced one of my friends to Achewood. The good news is she is now fully on the Achewood train. The bad news? Well, let's just say it was late, there was energy drink, and we'd been up for ages writing deliberately bad fanfiction, so in the end, we came up with this:

"OREGON TRAIL: THE MOVIE. Starring Alan Rickman as Hiram the sexually aggressive blacksmith."

Yeah. I'm gonna have to plead guilty on that one.

name: catgrl131
text: fuckalgebra, If you don't post this you are no longer my friend.

name: semiquaver
text: Is he still your friend?

name: fuckalgebra
text: I'm heck of sorry, dogg, we were inspired by bad fanfic but we never actually wrote it...but I suppose we COULD. Hmmm.

name: ford
text: "Officer McClane, do you care for a cocktail while you wait?"

name: tekende
text:
#Hiram_doesnt_understand_television_and_spends_all_evening_hiding_behind_the_couch

#Hiram_has_a_headache_like_every_damn_night_these_days

#Hirams_ex_keeps_leaving_messages_on_the_voicemail

name: fineoakstructure
text: hiding what? How did assetbar cut something off like that...

name: tekende
text:
Well, shit. I don't remember what it said. Probably something like "hiding from the people in the glowing box". But I'm not sure.

Wait, maybe it said "hiding behind the couch". Yes, I'm pretty sure that was it.
